biotools.summary: DMEAS is a user-friendly DNA methylation analysis tool for DNA methylation pattern extraction, DNA methylation level estimation, DNA methylation entropy analysis and multi-sample comparison. It was developed in order to assess the DNA methylation variations for a given genomic locus or genome-wide methylation data.
